void ADC_SetInjectedOffset ( ADC_TypeDef * ADCx, uint8_t ADC_InjectedChannel, uint16_t Offset)

void ADC_ExternalTrigInjectedConvEdgeConfig ( ADC_TypeDef * ADCx, uint32_t ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge)

section.title: void ADC_DeInit (void)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes all ADCs peripherals registers to their default reset values.

section.title: void ADC_Init (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, ADC_InitTypeDef *ADC_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the ADCx peripheral according to the specified parameters in the ADC_InitStruct.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This function is used to configure the global features of the ADC ( Resolution and Data Alignment), however, the rest of the configuration parameters are specific to the regular channels group (scan mode activation, continuous mode activation, External trigger source and edge, number of conversion in the regular channels group sequencer).

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
pointer to an ADC_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified ADC peripheral.

section.title: void ADC_StructInit (ADC_InitTypeDef *ADC_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each ADC_InitStruct member with its default value.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: This function is used to initialize the global features of the ADC ( Resolution and Data Alignment), however, the rest of the configuration parameters are specific to the regular channels group (scan mode activation, continuous mode activation, External trigger source and edge, number of conversion in the regular channels group sequencer).

entry.para: pointer to an ADC_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void ADC_CommonInit (ADC_CommonInitTypeDef *ADC_CommonInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the ADCs peripherals according to the specified parameters in the ADC_CommonInitStruct.

entry.para: pointer to an ADC_CommonInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for All ADCs peripherals.

section.title: void ADC_CommonStructInit (ADC_CommonInitTypeDef *ADC_CommonInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each ADC_CommonInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to an ADC_CommonInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void ADC_Cmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified ADC peripheral.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the ADCx peripheral. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_AnalogWatchdogCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint32_t ADC_AnalogWatchdog)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the analog watchdog on single/all regular or injected channels.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the ADC analog watchdog configuration. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_SingleRegEnable: Analog watchdog on a single regular channel
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_SingleInjecEnable: Analog watchdog on a single injected channel
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_SingleRegOrInjecEnable: Analog watchdog on a single regular or injected channel
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_AllRegEnable: Analog watchdog on all regular channel
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_AllInjecEnable: Analog watchdog on all injected channel
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_AllRegAllInjecEnable: Analog watchdog on all regular and injected channels
ADC_AnalogWatchdog_None: No channel guarded by the analog watchdog

section.title: void ADC_AnalogWatchdogThresholdsConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint16_t HighThreshold, uint16_t LowThreshold)
section.emphasis: Configures the high and low thresholds of the analog watchdog.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
the ADC analog watchdog High threshold value. This parameter must be a 12-bit value.
the ADC analog watchdog Low threshold value. This parameter must be a 12-bit value.

section.title: void ADC_AnalogWatchdogSingleChannelConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_Channel)
section.emphasis: Configures the analog watchdog guarded single channel.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the ADC channel to configure for the analog watchdog. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_Channel_0: ADC Channel0 selected
ADC_Channel_1: ADC Channel1 selected
ADC_Channel_2: ADC Channel2 selected
ADC_Channel_3: ADC Channel3 selected
ADC_Channel_4: ADC Channel4 selected
ADC_Channel_5: ADC Channel5 selected
ADC_Channel_6: ADC Channel6 selected
ADC_Channel_7: ADC Channel7 selected
ADC_Channel_8: ADC Channel8 selected
ADC_Channel_9: ADC Channel9 selected
ADC_Channel_10: ADC Channel10 selected
ADC_Channel_11: ADC Channel11 selected
ADC_Channel_12: ADC Channel12 selected
ADC_Channel_13: ADC Channel13 selected
ADC_Channel_14: ADC Channel14 selected
ADC_Channel_15: ADC Channel15 selected
ADC_Channel_16: ADC Channel16 selected
ADC_Channel_17: ADC Channel17 selected
ADC_Channel_18: ADC Channel18 selected

section.title: void ADC_TempSensorVrefintCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the temperature sensor and Vrefint channels.

entry.para: new state of the temperature sensor and Vrefint channels. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_VBATCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the VBAT (Voltage Battery) channel.

entry.para: new state of the VBAT channel. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_RegularChannelConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_Channel, uint8_t Rank, uint8_t ADC_SampleTime)
section.emphasis: Configures for the selected ADC regular channel its corresponding rank in the sequencer and its sample time.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the ADC channel to configure. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_Channel_0: ADC Channel0 selected
ADC_Channel_1: ADC Channel1 selected
ADC_Channel_2: ADC Channel2 selected
ADC_Channel_3: ADC Channel3 selected
ADC_Channel_4: ADC Channel4 selected
ADC_Channel_5: ADC Channel5 selected
ADC_Channel_6: ADC Channel6 selected
ADC_Channel_7: ADC Channel7 selected
ADC_Channel_8: ADC Channel8 selected
ADC_Channel_9: ADC Channel9 selected
ADC_Channel_10: ADC Channel10 selected
ADC_Channel_11: ADC Channel11 selected
ADC_Channel_12: ADC Channel12 selected
ADC_Channel_13: ADC Channel13 selected
ADC_Channel_14: ADC Channel14 selected
ADC_Channel_15: ADC Channel15 selected
ADC_Channel_16: ADC Channel16 selected
ADC_Channel_17: ADC Channel17 selected
ADC_Channel_18: ADC Channel18 selected
The rank in the regular group sequencer. This parameter must be between 1 to 16.

The sample time value to be set for the selected channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_SampleTime_3Cycles: Sample time equal to 3 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_15Cycles: Sample time equal to 15 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_28Cycles: Sample time equal to 28 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_56Cycles: Sample time equal to 56 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_84Cycles: Sample time equal to 84 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_112Cycles: Sample time equal to 112 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_144Cycles: Sample time equal to 144 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_480Cycles: Sample time equal to 480 cycles

section.title: void ADC_SoftwareStartConv (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
section.emphasis: Enables the selected ADC software start conversion of the regular channels.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

section.title: FlagStatus ADC_GetSoftwareStartConvStatus (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
section.emphasis: Gets the selected ADC Software start regular conversion Status.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of ADC software start conversion (SET or RESET).

section.title: void ADC_EOCOnEachRegularChannelCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the EOC on each regular channel conversion.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC EOC flag rising This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_ContinuousModeCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the ADC continuous conversion mode.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC continuous conversion mode This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_DiscModeChannelCountConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t Number)
section.emphasis: Configures the discontinuous mode for the selected ADC regular group channel.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
specifies the discontinuous mode regular channel count value. This number must be between 1 and 8.

section.title: void ADC_DiscModeCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the discontinuous mode on regular group channel for the specified ADC.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC discontinuous mode on regular group channel. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: uint16_t ADC_GetConversionValue (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
section.emphasis: Returns the last ADCx conversion result data for regular channel.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
Data conversion value.

section.title: uint32_t ADC_GetMultiModeConversionValue (void)
section.emphasis: Returns the last ADC1, ADC2 and ADC3 regular conversions results data in the selected multi mode.

entry.para: Data conversion value.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: In dual mode, the value returned by this function is as following Data[15:0] : these bits contain the regular data of ADC1. Data[31:16]: these bits contain the regular data of ADC2.

In triple mode, the value returned by this function is as following Data[15:0] : these bits contain alternatively the regular data of ADC1, ADC3 and ADC2. Data[31:16]: these bits contain alternatively the regular data of ADC2, ADC1 and ADC3.

section.title: void ADC_DMACmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified ADC DMA request.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC DMA transfer. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_DMARequestAfterLastTransferCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the ADC DMA request after last transfer (Single-ADC mode)

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC DMA request after last transfer. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_MultiModeDMARequestAfterLastTransferCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the ADC DMA request after last transfer in multi ADC mode.

entry.para: new state of the selected ADC DMA request after last transfer. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para: if Enabled, DMA requests are issued as long as data are converted and DMA mode for multi ADC mode (selected using ADC_CommonInit() function by ADC_CommonInitStruct.ADC_DMAAccessMode structure member) is ADC_DMAAccessMode_1, ADC_DMAAccessMode_2 or ADC_DMAAccessMode_3.

section.title: void ADC_InjectedChannelConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_Channel, uint8_t Rank, uint8_t ADC_SampleTime)
section.emphasis: Configures for the selected ADC injected channel its corresponding rank in the sequencer and its sample time.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the ADC channel to configure. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_Channel_0: ADC Channel0 selected
ADC_Channel_1: ADC Channel1 selected
ADC_Channel_2: ADC Channel2 selected
ADC_Channel_3: ADC Channel3 selected
ADC_Channel_4: ADC Channel4 selected
ADC_Channel_5: ADC Channel5 selected
ADC_Channel_6: ADC Channel6 selected
ADC_Channel_7: ADC Channel7 selected
ADC_Channel_8: ADC Channel8 selected
ADC_Channel_9: ADC Channel9 selected
ADC_Channel_10: ADC Channel10 selected
ADC_Channel_11: ADC Channel11 selected
ADC_Channel_12: ADC Channel12 selected
ADC_Channel_13: ADC Channel13 selected
ADC_Channel_14: ADC Channel14 selected
ADC_Channel_15: ADC Channel15 selected
ADC_Channel_16: ADC Channel16 selected
ADC_Channel_17: ADC Channel17 selected
ADC_Channel_18: ADC Channel18 selected
The rank in the injected group sequencer. This parameter must be between 1 to 4.

The sample time value to be set for the selected channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_SampleTime_3Cycles: Sample time equal to 3 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_15Cycles: Sample time equal to 15 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_28Cycles: Sample time equal to 28 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_56Cycles: Sample time equal to 56 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_84Cycles: Sample time equal to 84 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_112Cycles: Sample time equal to 112 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_144Cycles: Sample time equal to 144 cycles
ADC_SampleTime_480Cycles: Sample time equal to 480 cycles

section.title: void ADC_InjectedSequencerLengthConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t Length)
section.emphasis: Configures the sequencer length for injected channels.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
The sequencer length. This parameter must be a number between 1 to 4.

section.title: void ADC_SetInjectedOffset (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_InjectedChannel, uint16_t Offset)
section.emphasis: Set the injected channels conversion value offset.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the ADC injected channel to set its offset. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_InjectedChannel_1: Injected Channel1 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_2: Injected Channel2 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_3: Injected Channel3 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_4: Injected Channel4 selected
the offset value for the selected ADC injected channel This parameter must be a 12bit value.

section.title: void ADC_ExternalTrigInjectedConvConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint32_t ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv)
section.emphasis: Configures the ADCx external trigger for injected channels conversion.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the ADC trigger to start injected conversion. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T1_CC4: Timer1 capture compare4 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T1_TRGO: Timer1 TRGO event selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T2_CC1: Timer2 capture compare1 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T2_TRGO: Timer2 TRGO event selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T3_CC2: Timer3 capture compare2 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T3_CC4: Timer3 capture compare4 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T4_CC1: Timer4 capture compare1 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T4_CC2: Timer4 capture compare2 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T4_CC3: Timer4 capture compare3 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T4_TRGO: Timer4 TRGO event selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T5_CC4: Timer5 capture compare4 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T5_TRGO: Timer5 TRGO event selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T8_CC2: Timer8 capture compare2 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T8_CC3: Timer8 capture compare3 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_T8_CC4: Timer8 capture compare4 selected
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConv_Ext_IT15: External interrupt line 15 event selected

section.title: void ADC_ExternalTrigInjectedConvEdgeConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint32_t ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge)
section.emphasis: Configures the ADCx external trigger edge for injected channels conversion.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the ADC external trigger edge to start injected conversion. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge_None: external trigger disabled for injected conversion
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge_Rising: detection on rising edge
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge_Falling: detection on falling edge
ADC_ExternalTrigInjecConvEdge_RisingFalling: detection on both rising and falling edge

section.title: void ADC_SoftwareStartInjectedConv (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
section.emphasis: Enables the selected ADC software start conversion of the injected channels.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

section.title: FlagStatus ADC_GetSoftwareStartInjectedConvCmdStatus (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
section.emphasis: Gets the selected ADC Software start injected conversion Status.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of ADC software start injected conversion (SET or RESET).

section.title: void ADC_AutoInjectedConvCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the selected ADC automatic injected group conversion after regular one.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC auto injected conversion This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void ADC_InjectedDiscModeCmd (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the discontinuous mode for injected group channel for the specified ADC.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.
new state of the selected ADC discontinuous mode on injected group channel. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: uint16_t ADC_GetInjectedConversionValue (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_InjectedChannel)
section.emphasis: Returns the ADC injected channel conversion result.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

the converted ADC injected channel. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_InjectedChannel_1: Injected Channel1 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_2: Injected Channel2 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_3: Injected Channel3 selected
ADC_InjectedChannel_4: Injected Channel4 selected
Data conversion value.

section.title: void ADC_ITConfig (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint16_t ADC_IT, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the specified ADC interrupts.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the ADC interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_IT_EOC: End of conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_AWD: Analog watchdog interrupt mask
ADC_IT_JEOC: End of injected conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_OVR: Overrun interrupt enable
new state of the specified ADC interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: FlagStatus ADC_GetFlagStatus (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified ADC flag is set or not.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_FLAG_AWD: Analog watchdog flag
ADC_FLAG_EOC: End of conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_JEOC: End of injected group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_JSTRT: Start of injected group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_STRT: Start of regular group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_OVR: Overrun flag
new state of ADC_FLAG (SET or RESET).

section.title: void ADC_ClearFlag (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t ADC_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Clears the ADCx's pending flags.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the flag to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
ADC_FLAG_AWD: Analog watchdog flag
ADC_FLAG_EOC: End of conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_JEOC: End of injected group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_JSTRT: Start of injected group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_STRT: Start of regular group conversion flag
ADC_FLAG_OVR: Overrun flag

section.title: ITStatus ADC_GetITStatus (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint16_t ADC_IT)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified ADC interrupt has occurred or not.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the ADC interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_IT_EOC: End of conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_AWD: Analog watchdog interrupt mask
ADC_IT_JEOC: End of injected conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_OVR: Overrun interrupt mask
new state of ADC_IT (SET or RESET).

section.title: void ADC_ClearITPendingBit (ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint16_t ADC_IT)
section.emphasis: Clears the ADCx's interrupt pending bits.

entry.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the ADC peripheral.

specifies the ADC interrupt pending bit to clear. This parameter can be one of the following values:
ADC_IT_EOC: End of conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_AWD: Analog watchdog interrupt mask
ADC_IT_JEOC: End of injected conversion interrupt mask
ADC_IT_OVR: Overrun interrupt mask
